text:
FWIW the fork approach is not great because the fork gets out of sync with the base repo. The ideal would be:
1. Delete the fork
2. Add <@U01RZAE2CV6> as a member of JuliaGPU org
3. <@U01RZAE2CV6> transfers the repo to the JuliaGPU org
